title: Is Muramana Ryze a thing now?
body:
Out of all champions, he has the most single target spells  (Q,W,E) and auto attacks, and he can channel it at a consistent rate.

What do you think?

replies.body: muramana ryze use to be a thing back in like s5 early s6
i remember that in season 4 but not 5 and 6..

> [{quoted}](name=Rengar Revert,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=B9HgRs9R,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-04-19T01:52:24.509+0000)
>
> i remember that in season 4 but not 5 and 6..

It pretty much stopped working after the Ryze rework that changed his Ulti from AoE spellvamp..and the removal of mana on old BV.
i started midway season 5 and it was a thing then into early 6 or whatever, idk anything about season 4 tho

Not really because he has shitty attack speed and meh auto range.  He really doesn't have time to weave many slow ass autos in.

Also if you were... you'd be better off with lichbane/seraph.
Muramana applies on single target abilities as well, which was why it was a thing in earlier seasons, nobody auto attacked with it back then.
